page.title: 20BURTON SALMON APPRECIATIONS
page.content: A large vote of thanks must be given to Mr.Baldwin and the children in his class. They have done most of the work presented on these pages. Thank you must also be said to the people in the area of Hillam,Burton Salmon and Brotherton who so willingly gave their help. Special mention must be given to the children of Burton Salmon School and the staff Mrs.Milner,Mrs. Borthwick and Mrs.Little. Thank you also to Mrs.Perry and Miss Crawford for their help. A big thank you to the children of Brotherton School,not forgetting the teachers Mr.Webb, Mrs.White, Miss Wear, Miss Jackman, Mrs.Leggett and Mrs Bastey. THANK YOU, Goodbye, F.Eyres
